title: Gesshoku Kitan
description: High schooler Hoshino Terumichi has been haunted by a recurring dream: a young man, a century earlier, dying at the hands of another man he calls "Sensei." This dream – or curse – is about to merge with reality when a mysterious, attractive classmate named Yamada Omihiko steps into Terumichi's life.

matches.title: Ichigo no Yume - Shimatsuya Risuke no Kaii Jikenchou
